name: Peoria Pride Festival
description: An all-ages Pride celebration featuring live music, local vendors, community organizations, and affirming spaces for the entire LGBTQIA+ community.

name: Drag Bingo Night
description: A high-energy drag bingo night with performances, prizes, and plenty of sass. 19+ event.

name: Trans & Nonbinary Support Group
description: A confidential, peer-led support group for trans, nonbinary, and gender-questioning individuals. Free to attend.

name: Queer Artist Showcase
description: An evening showcasing queer visual artists, musicians, and spoken-word performers from Central Illinois.

name: LGBTQ+ Health & Wellness Fair
description: A free wellness fair featuring affirming healthcare providers, mental health resources, HIV/STI testing, and community support organizations.
